title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Mathematics Problem-Solving Projects Utilizing Smart Machines and Simulations

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world work scenarios in simulation environments and propose optimal solutions by applying mathematical models.
Learners can iteratively refine problem-solving strategies through peer evaluation and feedback in simulation-based projects.
Learners can assess the strengths and weaknesses of smart machines (AI/automation tools) and design practical approaches to address limitations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
